name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Security Engineer with extensive experience in **cloud security**, threat hunting, and SOC operations. Proficient in working with **AWS** and **Azure** cloud environments, implementing security solutions utilizing tools like **Sentinel**, **Splunk**, and **Rapid7**. Well-versed in **SIEM**, **EDR**, and **DLP** strategies to safeguard organizational assets. Strong scripting capabilities in **Python** and **PowerShell** for automating security tasks and processes.

With 13+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, I bring a unique blend of technical acumen and cybersecurity expertise. I've built high-performance applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, while leveraging frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My background includes developing AI/ML-powered platforms focused on real-time processing and predictive analytics. I have successfully deployed cloud-native systems while conforming to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My collaborative communication skills enable me to work effectively within cross-functional teams.

Developed and maintained **EDR** solutions ensuring endpoint security for over **200** devices through proactive detection and response strategies.
Utilized data loss prevention techniques (**DLP**) to safeguard sensitive information, achieving a reduction in data leakage incidents by **30%** over **12** months.

Leveraged **Python** and **PowerShell** scripting for automated security monitoring and reporting, which improved operational efficiency and reduced manual tasks by **50%**.
Collaborated cross-functionally to ensure effective security practices across all project teams, facilitating clear communication of security policies and procedures.
Participated in regular security assessments and audits using tools like **Rapid7** and **CSPM**, delivering comprehensive reports and actionable insights to senior management.
Created and managed incident documentation and action plans, following up on incidents to ensure they are closed with effective preventive measures in place for future occurrences.
Regularly updated and maintained security training programs for staff, enhancing awareness and compliance with security protocols across the organization.
Conducted security reviews of third-party tools and platforms to evaluate risks, ensuring that all integrations adhere to organizational security standards.

Implemented and maintained cloud security solutions in **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring compliance with industry standards and best practices for cloud infrastructure.
Conducted thorough threat hunting and incident response operations utilizing **SIEM** tools like **Splunk** and **Rapid7**, optimizing detection and reaction times to potential security threats.
Developed and automated security scripts using **Python** and **PowerShell** to streamline operational processes and enhance **SOC operations**, improving efficiency by **30%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and deploy data loss prevention strategies (DLP), utilizing **Sentinel** for monitoring and incident management.
Managed security incidents and breaches, applying advanced knowledge of endpoint detection and response (EDR) solutions to minimize impact.
Developed and executed security policies and protocols to ensure robust protection against vulnerabilities and risks, leading to a reduction in incidents by **15%** over **6 months**.
Engaged in effective communication across teams to foster a culture of security awareness, enhancing the collaborative aspect of **SOC operations** and improving engagement scores by **25%**.

Implemented cloud security measures across **Azure** and **AWS** environments to safeguard critical data and applications against emerging threats.
Conducted SOC operations to monitor security incidents, utilizing **SIEM** tools like **Splunk** and **Rapid7** for real-time threat detection and compliance auditing.
Executed threat hunting initiatives, analyzing data from **EDR** solutions and **DLP** strategies to proactively identify vulnerabilities and enhance incident response times by **30%**.
Developed security scripts in **Python** and **PowerShell** to automate operational processes, increasing efficiency in threat detection analysis by **25%** and reducing false positives.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance security posture, effectively communicating risks and strategies to stakeholders, improving risk management practices and fostering a security-first culture.
